faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: We answer your questions. Decide with data.

items.question: What is ADNCreativo?
items.answer: A tool that takes your site URL, extracts your brand (logo, colors, fonts) and generates creatives ready to publish. No briefs. No designer. Less cost, more speed.

items.question: Who uses it?
items.answer: Marketing teams, agencies and brands that want to produce more creatives without depending on a designer or generic AI that doesn't convert.

items.question: Does it generate text and images?
items.answer: Yes. Images, copy and formats for social. All aligned to your brand because the AI reads your web first.

items.question: How is it different from other AIs?
items.answer: Other AIs give you generic creatives. ADNCreativo learns your brand from your URL and generates everything consistently. More recognition = better performance.

items.question: What networks and formats?
items.answer: Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, X (Twitter), TikTok. Formats ready for each. One place, all networks.

items.question: Can I use multiple brands or clients?
items.answer: Yes. One account, multiple sites. Change the URL and generate for another brand in a tap.

items.question: Where is everything stored?
items.answer: On our servers. You don't have to configure anything. Log in, paste URL, generate.

items.question: Why use it now?
items.answer: Every day you publish creatives that aren't recognized as yours, you lose sales and recognition. Whoever unifies brand first, wins. The cost of not acting is to keep spending on ads that don't stand out.
